Class MusicOrganizer

java.lang.Object
  MusicOrganizer

public class MusicOrganizer
extends java.lang.Object

A class to hold details of audio tracks. Individual tracks may be played.

Version:
2011.07.31
Author:
David J. Barnes and Michael KÃ¶lling
